column4: I'm using Irssi and I'm having issues with it not keeping much on the screen. The scrollbar is static so I lose a line of text after 30 or so more follow it. Is this terminal or the client?
irssi has its own "window" that keeps track of the buffer.  The scrollbar in the terminal itself won
won't do anything.  You may be able to scroll up and down with page-up/down, if not, you can use alt-p and alt-n for previous/next pages for scrolling
RegressLess: he mentions the method outlined here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/LostPassword  but I'm still not sure how you managed to log in.
